title: Holiday
lyrics:
Swineun nal-inde neon mwohae
Saeng-gag iss-eum nawa nollae
Holiday
Ttiling ttiling neo mwohae
Bakk-e nalssi joh-eunde

Nalang nol-a eottae Oh



Ah yajasue kokoneos

Issneun geogin anideolado

Amulyeom eottae Oh



Gwaenhi malhaejugi silhji eodil

Gage doelji ajig-eun No way

Neoleul bomyeon jangnanchigo

Sip-eun nae mam gat-eun gos



Baby maybe neoneun

Naleul jal algo iss-euni

Jogeum geogjeongseuleon nunbich-i boyeo



Baby Baby Cause you

Hanabuteo yeolkkaji

Neol wihaeseo junbihan nae ma-eum



Neoui son-eul jabgo

Eodideunji Go Go

Eonjedeun You’re always by my side



Salamdeul saileul

Bijibgo heeomchyeo

Tteonaja



Oh oh oh oh Oh oh oh oh

Holi Holi Holi Holiday



Holi Holi Holi

Holi Holi Holiday



Holi Holi Holi

Oh oh oh oh Oh oh oh oh



Ay nun-ap-e Ocean view

Neoman iss-eum mallibu

Sajin sog eodideun

Neoman iss-eum geogiya



Gwaenhi malhaejugi silhji eodil

Gage doelji ajig-eun No way

Neoleul bomyeon jangnanchigo

Sip-eun nae mam gat-eun gos



Baby maybe neoneun

Naleul jal algo iss-euni

Jogeum geogjeongseuleon nunbich-i boyeo



Baby Baby Cause you

Hanabuteo yeolkkaji

Neol wihaeseo junbihan nae ma-eum



Neoui son-eul jabgo

Eodideunji Go Go

Eonjedeun You’re always by my side



Salamdeul saileul

Bijibgo heeomchyeo

Tteonaja



Oh oh oh oh Oh oh oh oh

Holi Holi Holi Holiday



Holi Holi Holi

Holi Holi Holiday



Holi Holi Holi

Oh oh oh oh Oh oh oh oh



Oneul nae halu

Neoui halue

Modeun geol deonjigoseo

Neol gippeuge hallae



Du son-eul maj-jabgoseo neowa hamkkelamyeon

Eodideun Paradise



Yeogiga Paradise

Mwoga deo pil-yohae



Neowa na dul-imyeon eodideun gwaenchanh-a Oh my baby

Eodideunji Go Go
